item.title: The key to a long life is avoiding the ‘poisonous 5 P’s,’ says one of the world’s top anti-aging experts
item.description: Italian kids aren’t actually following the Mediterranean diet, says Valter Longo.

item.title: What, exactly, is a bomb cyclone?
item.description: Storm blasts Oregon, Northern California and Washington.

item.title: From TV doctor to Trump insider: How Dr. Mehmet Oz built his empire and found political power
item.description: Trump appointed Oz to the President's Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition during his first term.

item.title: Uber unveils new XXL service and offerings for holiday travelers
item.description: Finally, a ride that’s big enough to fit your jumbo suitcase.

item.title: Ford plans 4,000 more job cuts in Europe as EVs lose momentum
item.description: The reductions amount to around 14% of Ford European workforce and will primarily hit operations in Germany and the U.K. by the end of 2027.
